description:
**This package is deprecated.**

End users should install the [dotnetfx](https://chocolatey.org/packages/dotnetfx) package.

Package maintainers should depend on the [netfx-4.7.2](https://chocolatey.org/packages/netfx-4.7.2) package.
summary: The .NET Framework is a development platform for building apps for web, Windows, Windows Phone, Windows Server, and Microsoft Azure.
author: Microsoft
